title: Integrating graph convolutional networks to enhance prompt learning for biomedical relation extraction

abstract: Abstract Background and Objective: Biomedical relation extraction aims to reveal the relation between entities in medical texts. Currently, the relation extraction models that have attracted much attention are mainly to fine-tune the pre-trained language …
